title: What can be represented with a single binary digit

content.description: Directions: For the question or incomplete statement below, two of the suggested answers are correct. For this question, you must select both correct choices to earn credit. No partial credit will be earned if only one correct choice is selected. Select the two that are best in each case.
content.question: Which of the following can be represented by a single binary digit? Select two answers.

choices.label: The position of the minute hand of a clock
The remainder when dividing a whole number by 2
The value of a Boolean variable
The volume of a car radio

content.answer: The remainder when dividing a whole number by 2
